amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete section 514 which prohibits any funds in the bill from being used to pay for abortion; and prohibits funds provided to any health plan under the Federal Employees Health Benefit Program from being used to provide coverage for abortions.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike section 514 from the bill. Section 514 relates to prohibition of FEHB plan coverage for abortions.

action.text: On agreeing to the DeLauro amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 239 (Roll No. 288).
